data.title: Camera changes v3.13
data.body:
Cameras are giving different results v3.12 and v3.13.

I've made a video for clarity.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/sab8pjpazbk191v/camera%20problem.mov?dl=0

I've experienced few other bugs/differences as well. Maybe they are all related.

data.title: [AUTO][ci skip]: updating cocos2dx_files.json
Don't build New Project in cross platform IDE's on OS X
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.13 && 3.12
- devices test on: mac Mini
- developing environments
  - NDK version:
  - Xcode version: 7.3.1
  - VS version:
  - brower type and version:

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create project from console.
2. Build project in QTCreator, CLion, NetBeans, CodeBlocks etc on OS X. 
3. Get "Undifinded symbol for architecture x86-64".

In cocos2d-x v3.11 all works fine. Seems like some librarys in "CMakeList.txt" files are not linked well. I'm using Ubuntu and OS X, and for me is impotent to use one IDE for development.

data.title: Fix the Anchor Point issue and prepend the methods calls with this->.
data.body:
We are setting the anchor point to the center of the Menu
so the call of setIgnoreAnchorPointForPosition must be with
"false" argument.

Also prepend all the methods calls with this to keep the
consistency between the calls.

data.title: Ref's reference counting is using non-atomic ints, while allowing reference count mutation across multiple threads
Could cocos2dx team will fix/optimize some little bugs in cocos2d-x(JSB)?
data.body:
I found some little bugs on cocos2dx(JSB) code, or missing some function.
such as:
https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/16448

Or some components need be optimized, like below:
https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/16447 

So,
Is Cocos2dx(JSB) is so important that you guys don't care fix these issues?
Or
You guys want all the cocos2d-js user move to CREATOR, so don't want fix these little bugs in cocos2d(JSB)?  

Or don't want to improve these components in cocos2d-x, specially cocos2d-x(jsb)?

data.title: Support for Game Controllers on Mac
data.body:
iOS and Mac share the same API for game controllers.
Adding support for Mac is almost free and it makes more sense to play game on Mac with game controllers than on iOS

data.title: cocos3.13   jsval_to_std_string

data.body:
- cocos2d-x version:  3.13

https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/blob/v3/cocos/scripting/js-bindings/manual/js_manual_conversions.cpp  line:604

原本是 if(v.isString() || v.isNumber())

现在变成  if(v.isString() || v.isBoolean())

这真的好吗？  在js代码中， 经常 setString(123), 很少setString(true)吧？

data.title: Add missing definition of PhysicsBody::getFirstShape (Revert part of #13923)
data.body:
Here is a link to the forum post: http://discuss.cocos2d-x.org/t/bug-in-physicsbody-cocos2dx-api/28609

`PhysicsBody::getFirstShape` function can not be found, but the function exists in the currently `v3-doc` branch and API docs here:
- https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/blob/v3-doc/cocos/physics/CCPhysicsBody.h#L296-L305
- http://www.cocos2d-x.org/docs/api-ref/cplusplus/v3x/d7/d7b/classcocos2d_1_1_physics_body.html#aa84c257ea4703d4f9f924b3e18e1b0f4

It seems to be deleted on `v3` branch in commit https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/commit/a17a702cd1389bfed376dffbd74ec95780a2ca74 (PR: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/pull/13923, since v3.9), so it looks like it was a mistake.

This PR reverts the part of the commit https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/commit/a17a702cd1389bfed376dffbd74ec95780a2ca74#diff-48ac453e3782f31d7148e35abdab40e6L210. If `PhysicsBody::getFirstShape` will be removed in a future version, we should mark it as deprecated and remove after some time.

Thanks!

data.title: [ci skip][AUTO]: updating luabinding & jsbinding automatically
crash in void Renderer::fillVerticesAndIndices(const TrianglesCommand* cmd)
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version:3.13(branch v3)
- devices test on:iphone 6plus  ios 9.3.3
- developing environments
  - NDK version:
  - Xcode version: 7.3.1 (7D1014)
  - VS version:
  - brower type and version:

Steps to Reproduce:
1. upgrade spine to newest (spine-c ,spine-cocos2dx)
2. try example in spine-cocos2dx.

will crash when you run BatchingExample or run RaptorExample and tap screen enter the batching scene.
xcode report :EXC_BAD_ACCESS  in this line (function : fillVerticesAndIndices in CCRender)
memcpy(&_verts[_filledVertex], cmd->getVertices(), sizeof(V3F_C4B_T2F) \* cmd->getVertexCount());

for memcpy to _verts is bad access.
_verts not null, _filledVertex less than 65536, in most of the time, _filledVertex is 512.
but it's not happened in iOS simulator.
@minggo

data.title: Add missing override keywords
data.body:
Hello, when I tried to compile with Clang 3.8 on Linux, I get the following warning message:

```
cocos/platform/linux/CCApplication-linux.h:56:10: warning: 'setAnimationInterval' overrides a member function but is not marked 'override' [-Winconsistent-missing-override]
    void setAnimationInterval(float interval);
         ^
cocos/platform/linux/CCApplication-linux.h:73:26: warning: 'getCurrentLanguage' overrides a member function but is not marked 'override' [-Winconsistent-missing-override]
    virtual LanguageType getCurrentLanguage();
                         ^
cocos/platform/linux/CCApplication-linux.h:79:26: warning: 'getCurrentLanguageCode' overrides a member function but is not marked 'override' [-Winconsistent-missing-override]
    virtual const char * getCurrentLanguageCode();
                         ^
cocos/platform/linux/CCApplication-linux.h:91:16: warning: 'openURL' overrides a member function but is not marked 'override' [-Winconsistent-missing-override]
  virtual bool openURL(const std::string &url);
               ^
cocos/platform/linux/CCApplication-linux.h:109:22: warning: 'getTargetPlatform' overrides a member function but is not marked 'override' [-Winconsistent-missing-override]
    virtual Platform getTargetPlatform();
                     ^
cocos/platform/linux/CCFileUtils-linux.h:54:10: warning: 'init' overrides a member function but is not marked 'override' [-Winconsistent-missing-override]
    bool init();
         ^
cocos/platform/linux/CCFileUtils-linux.h:55:25: warning: 'getWritablePath' overrides a member function but is not marked 'override' [-Winconsistent-missing-override]
    virtual std::string getWritablePath() const;
                        ^
cocos/ui/UIEditBox/UIEditBoxImpl-linux.h:73:18: warning: 'setNativeMaxLength' overrides a member function but is not marked 'override' [-Winconsistent-missing-override]
    virtual void setNativeMaxLength(int maxLength) {};
                 ^
```

This PR adds the missing override keywords and fix indentation (2 spaces to 4 spaces).

data.title: Fix memory leak caused by packetOut in SocketIO.cpp
data.body:
Static code analyzer cppcheck showed the following error on SocketIO.cpp:

```
Checking SocketIO.cpp...
[SocketIO.cpp:964]: (error) Memory leak: packetOut
```

I manually inspected the code and as far as I can tell it is, indeed, a memory leak.

data.title: "this.initWithString is not a function" when new cc.TextFieldTTF with params
data.body:
cocos2dx 3.10 JSB  run on  ipad3

code:

issue 1:
var snTxt=new cc.TextFieldTTF("","arial",24);   //echo : this.initWithString is not a function 

issue 2:
var snTxt=new cc.TextFieldTTF();
snTxt.setFontSize(36);  //echo  setFontSize is not a function 

issude 3:
var snTxt=new cc.TextFieldTTF();
snTxt.fontSize=36 //Nothing happened.....

How to set the size of  cc.TextFieldTTF?

data.title: cc.TextFieldTTF &cc.LabelTTF  need more optimization. Create a instance of TextFieldTTF need 50ms.
data.body:
cocos2dx 3.10 JSB
test on ipad 3

simple code:
var t=Date.now();
var txt=new cc.TextFieldTTF();
console.log(">>>>>>>>>>>>>> txt:"+(Date.now()-t));   //echo 50-53ms

Hope text components can be more efficient.

data.title: upgrade OpenSSL to v1.1.0
Fix variable shadowing warnings caused by Spine 3.4
data.body:
This PR fixes the following compiler warnings caused by spine-c runtime 3.4 with Xcode 7.3.1:

```
cocos/editor-support/spine/VertexAttachment.c:77:8: declaration shadows a local variable [-Wshadow]
cocos/editor-support/spine/VertexAttachment.c:97:8: declaration shadows a local variable [-Wshadow]
cocos/editor-support/spine/VertexAttachment.c:97:11: declaration shadows a local variable [-Wshadow]
cocos/editor-support/spine/VertexAttachment.c:97:17: declaration shadows a local variable [-Wshadow]
cocos/editor-support/spine/SkeletonJson.c:835:10: declaration shadows a local variable [-Wshadow]
```

Also, this patch has already been submitted and merged in upstream on [EsotericSoftware/spine-runtimes](https://github.com/EsotericSoftware/spine-runtimes) repo:
- https://github.com/EsotericSoftware/spine-runtimes/pull/656
- https://github.com/EsotericSoftware/spine-runtimes/pull/684

Thanks!
